tool_description: Analyzes refund requests for potential fraudulent patterns and assigns risk scores to transactions.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier for the refund request

order_age_days.description: Number of days since original order was placed

refund_frequency.description: Number of previous refunds by this customer in the last 90 days

error_messages: Customer not found: Customer ID does not exist in the fraud detection database.
Invalid refund amount: Amount must be a positive number greater than zero.
Invalid order age: Order age must be a non-negative integer.
Fraud detection service unavailable: Unable to connect to fraud detection service.
usage: Provide customer_id, refund_amount, and order_age_days to analyze the refund request for potential fraud indicators.

risk_score.description: Fraud risk score from 0-100 (higher indicates more risk)

fraud_indicators.description: List of identified fraud risk indicators

recommended_action.description: Recommended action based on risk assessment
